text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Pokaytesya pered Allahom kayattyam shchyrym! Mozhlyvo, Hospodʹ vidpustytʹ vam hrikhy vashi ta vvede vas u sady, de techutʹ riky. U toy Denʹ Allah ne prynyzytʹ Proroka y tykh iz nym, yaki uviruvaly. Svitlo yikh plyne poperedu nykh i pravoruch vid nykh. «Day nam spovna svitlo nashe y prosty nas, voistynu, Ty spromozhnyy na kozhnu rich
